parameter.name: contacts
parameter.description: One or more contact IDs for specified client.

parameter.name: date
parameter.description: Date of the new estimate. Default to current date.

parameter.name: poNumber
parameter.description: Purchase order number of the new estimate.

parameter.name: discount
parameter.description: Discount percentage of the new estimate.

parameter.name: currencyCode
parameter.description: Currency code of the new estimate.

parameter.name: pStreet1
parameter.description: Primary street1 name for new estimate.

parameter.name: pStreet2
parameter.description: Primary street2 name for new estimate.

parameter.name: pCity
parameter.description: Primary city name for new estimate.

parameter.name: pState
parameter.description: Primary state name for new estimate.

parameter.name: pCountry
parameter.description: Primary country name for new estimate.

parameter.name: lines
parameter.description: One or more task lines for new estimate.
